title: Skis
shortDesc: For skis that demand high durability and flexibility, Recyclamine’s recyclable epoxy provides enhanced performance and sustainability. We’re helping the industry reduce environmental impact while maintaining the resilience skiers rely on.

sections.title: Skis
sections.subTitle: The ski industry faces increasing demand for high-performance, durable materials.
sections.content: For this, conventional ski manufacturing relies on non-recyclable   composites, resulting in significant end-of-life waste. As a result, the environmental footprint of ski manufacturing and disposal is a growing concern.

sections.title: Why should you Care?
sections.subTitle: Investing in recyclable epoxy allows ski brands to:

sections.title: The Power of Recyclamine
sections.subTitle: Recyclamine provides advanced recyclable epoxy solutions tailored for skis, delivering strength and flexibility while supporting a closed-loop lifecycle.
sections.content: Our formulations are designed to maintain the performance standards skiers expect, without compromising on sustainability.

letsconnect.title: Ready to transform your products with recyclable epoxy? Connect with us to explore sustainable solutions tailored to your industry.

rows.Features: Low initial mix viscosity, short demolding time, ambient cure bio-based resin system ideal for Infusion, light RTM and wet lay-up processes.
Low initial mix viscosity, moderately reactivity system for Infusion, wet lay-up, Light RTM, etc.
Ambient curing system designed for Compression Molding Process.

title: Snowboards
shortDesc: Our snowboard, crafted with Recyclamine's epoxy, sets a new benchmark in performance, strength, and flexibility.The advanced material provides exceptional responsiveness, enabling riders to tackle varied terrains with precision and control.Beyond performance, our solution champions sustainability, offering a responsible approach to equipment disposal.By using Recyclamine’ s epoxy, we not only elevate the snowboarding experience but also contribute to a circular economy, ensuring a future where sports equipment is part of the sustainable solution.

sections.title: Snowboards
sections.subTitle: Traditional board production generates significant waste, and most boards are non-recyclable, adding to environmental strain.

sections.title: Why should you Care?
sections.subTitle: By adopting recyclable epoxy, you can:
content: Extend the life cycle of materials,
Meet the demands of eco-conscious consumers

sections.title: The Power of Recyclamine
sections.subTitle: Recyclamine creates epoxy systems specifically for surfboards and snowboards, combining flexibility, impact resistance, and recyclability.
